language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language for the application
language.selectLanguage: Select the language for all interface elements
language.changeNote: The language change takes effect immediately. Your preference is saved and will be remembered for future sessions.

extendedThinking.label: Extended Thinking
extendedThinking.description: Enable deeper reasoning with more thinking tokens (uses more credits).

defaultMode.label: Default Mode
defaultMode.description: Mode for new agents (Plan = read-only, Agent = can edit)

coAuthoredBy.label: Include Co-Authored-By
coAuthoredBy.description: Add "Co-authored-by: Claude" to git commits made by Claude

desktopNotifications.label: Desktop Notifications
desktopNotifications.description: Show system notifications when agent needs input or completes work

soundNotifications.label: Sound Notifications
soundNotifications.description: Play a sound when agent completes work while you're away

notifyWhenFocused.label: Notify When Focused
notifyWhenFocused.description: Show notifications even when the app window is active

autoAdvance.label: Auto-advance
autoAdvance.description: Where to go after archiving a workspace

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Control what data you share with us

analytics.label: Share Usage Analytics
analytics.description: Help us improve Agents by sharing anonymous usage data. We only track feature usage and app performance-never your code, prompts, or messages. No AI training on your data.
